projects.title: MizuSkin – AI-Powered Social Skincare App
projects.description: Developed an iOS skincare app using SwiftUI, Azure Functions, and OpenAI API to provide AI-powered skincare recommendations, personalized routines, and social sharing features that increased user engagement and retention.
highlights: Designed a cloud-integrated architecture with a TypeScript (Node.js) backend, Azure Table Storage, and Azure Blob Storage to handle user routines and history at scale while keeping data access fast and reliable.
Implemented secure authentication and CI/CD pipelines so new features could be shipped quickly with automated builds, tests, and deployments.

projects.title: PhreekyNoises – Social Music Tracking App
projects.description: Implemented a full-stack web application using React, Node.js, HTML, CSS, and MySQL that lets users track their music habits and connects to the Spotify API to manage authentication, music history, and friend connections.
highlights: Integrated the Spotify API to pull user listening history and profile data, persisting it in MySQL for charts and long-term insights.
Managed development tasks and feature implementations using an Agile Scrum board, coordinating sprints and iterative improvements across the project.
